description: Obtains information about the trust relationships for this account. If no input parameters are provided, such as DirectoryId or TrustIds, this request describes all the trust relationships belonging to the account.

parameters.name: TrustIds
parameters.description: A list of identifiers of the trust relationships for which to obtain the information. If this member is null, all trust relationships that belong to the current account are returned. An empty list results in an InvalidParameterException being thrown. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Trusts
nested_items.description: The list of Trust objects that were retrieved.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The Directory ID of the Amazon Web Services directory involved in the trust relationship.

nested_items.name: TrustId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the trust relationship.

nested_items.name: RemoteDomainName
nested_items.description: The Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of the external domain involved in the trust relationship.

nested_items.name: TrustType
nested_items.description: The trust relationship type. Forest is the default.

nested_items.name: CreatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the trust relationship was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the trust relationship was last updated.

nested_items.name: StateLastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the TrustState was last updated.

nested_items.name: SelectiveAuth
nested_items.description: Current state of selective authentication for the trust.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If not null, more results are available. Pass this value for the NextToken parameter in a subsequent call to  DescribeTrusts to retrieve the next set of items.
